welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Knowle, a charming town in the heart of United Kingdom. Known for its rich history and beautiful countryside, we invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Knowle!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free access for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
